lead_paragraph: An article on Feb. 11 previewing the World Cup qualifying match between the United States and Mexico misstated the year that Bob Bradley became the United States coach. It was 2006, not 2003.
snippet: An article on Feb. 11 previewing the World Cup qualifying match between the United States and Mexico misstated the year that Bob Bradley became the United States coach. It was 2006, not 2003.
